body: These can be a photograph, scan or photocopy of the original document.

components.hint: For example, a copy of your driving licence or passport. Maximum size: 7MB per file
components.label: Photo ID
components.name: auto_name__4

components.hint: For example an electricity or council tax bill in their name and it must be dated within the last 3 months. Maximum file size: 7MB
components.label: Proof of address
components.name: auto_name__22

heading: Upload your ID
lede: You must upload both proof of your ID and address.
